item.title: Browser Based Video Conferencing and Webinars
item.description:
Once restricted to businesses, video conferencing is now accessible to anyone with an internet connection and a web browser. MegaMeeting offers a suite of products for PCs, Macs, and Linux computers that don’t require typical downloads or installations. As long as you can use a web browser, you can participate in video conferences and webinars. MegaMeeting’s web-based system utilizes the Flash Player 9 plugin, commonly found in browsers like Internet Explorer, Firefox, and Safari...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/browser-based-video-conferencing-and-webinars/
